questions.title: How do I solve a NullPointerException in Java?
questions.description: I'm getting a NullPointerException when trying to access a variable. How can I solve this?

answers.text: You need to check if the variable is null before accessing it.
Make sure to initialize the variable before using it.

questions.title: How to convert a string to lowercase in Python?
questions.description: I have a string and I want to convert it to lowercase. What's the best way to do this in Python?

answers.text: You can use the `lower()` method to convert a string to lowercase in Python.
